ne5:1.2_0: “Yaṁ pucchitañca vissajjitañcā”ti gāthā, ayaṁ vicayo hāro.
ne5:2.2_0: Padaṁ vicinati, pañhaṁ vicinati, visajjanaṁ vicinati, pubbāparaṁ vicinati, assādaṁ vicinati, ādīnavaṁ vicinati, nissaraṇaṁ vicinati, phalaṁ vicinati, upāyaṁ vicinati, āṇattiṁ vicinati, anugītiṁ vicinati, sabbe nava suttante vicinati.
ne5:2.3_1: yathā āyasmā ajito pārāyane bhagavantaṁ pañhaṁ pucchati—
ne5:4.1_0: Imāni cattāri padāni pucchitāni, so eko pañho.
ne5:4.4_3: “kiṁsu tassa mahabbhayan”ti tasseva lokassa mahābhayaṁ pucchati.
ne5:7.1_0: Imāni cattāri padāni imehi catūhi padehi visajjitāni paṭhamaṁ paṭhamena, dutiyaṁ dutiyena, tatiyaṁ tatiyena, catutthaṁ catutthena.
ne5:8.1_0: “Kenassu nivuto loko”ti pañhe “avijjāya nivuto loko”ti visajjanā.
ne5:8.3_1: sabbapāṇānaṁ sabbabhūtānaṁ pariyāyato ekameva nīvaraṇaṁ vadāmi yadidaṁ avijjā,
ne5:8.4_1: avijjāya nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā natthi sattānaṁ nīvaraṇanti vadāmī”ti.
ne5:8.5_0: Tena ca paṭhamassa padassa visajjanā yuttā.
ne5:9.2_0: Yo puggalo nīvaraṇehi nivuto, so vivicchati.
ne5:9.4_1: na abhisaddahanto vīriyaṁ nārabhati akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya.
ne5:9.5_0: So idhappamādamanuyutto viharati pamatto, sukke dhamme na uppādiyati,
ne5:9.5_1: tassa te anuppādiyamānā nappakāsanti, yathāha bhagavā—
ne5:11.1_0: Tena ca dutiyassa padassa visajjanā yuttā.
ne5:14.1_0: Sāyaṁ taṇhā āsattibahulassa puggalassa “evaṁ abhijappā”ti karitvā tattha loko abhilitto nāma bhavati,
ne5:14.1_1: tena ca tatiyassa padassa visajjanā yuttā.
ne5:15.1_0: “Kiṁ su tassa mahabbhayan”ti pañhe “dukkhamassa mahabbhayan”ti visajjanā.
ne5:15.8_0: Tattha loko odhaso kadāci karahaci dukkhadukkhatāya muccati.
ne5:15.12_0: Saṅkhāradukkhatāya pana loko anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā muccati,
ne5:15.12_1: tasmā saṅkhāradukkhatā dukkhaṁ lokassāti katvā dukkhamassa mahabbhayanti.
ne5:15.13_0: Tena ca catutthassa padassa visajjanā yuttā.
ne5:17.5_0: Evaṁ samāpannassa lokassa evaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhassa kiṁ lokassa vodānaṁ vuṭṭhānamiti, evañhi āha.
ne5:18.2_0: Tattha yā abhijjhā ayaṁ lobho akusalamūlaṁ,
ne5:18.3_0: Tassevaṁ asamāhitassa chasu āyatanesu taṇhā savanti rūpataṇhā saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā dhammataṇhā, yathāha bhagavā—
ne5:19.2_0: Cakkhu savati manāpikesu rūpesu, amanāpikesu paṭihaññatīti.
ne5:19.7_0: mano savati manāpikesu dhammesu amanāpikesu paṭihaññatīti.
ne5:19.8_0: Iti sabbā ca savati, sabbathā ca savati.
ne5:20.1_0: “Sotānaṁ kiṁ nivāraṇan”ti pariyuṭṭhānavighātaṁ pucchati, idaṁ vodānaṁ.
ne5:20.2_1: kena sotā pidhīyare”ti anusayasamugghātaṁ pucchati, idaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ.
ne5:23.1_0: Kāyagatāya satiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya cakkhu nāviñchati manāpikesu rūpesu, amanāpikesu na paṭihaññati, sotaṁ …pe…
ne5:23.5_0: mano nāviñchati manāpikesu dhammesu, amanāpikesu na paṭihaññati.
ne5:24.3_0: Taṁ yathā khandhavantassa rukkhassa anavasesamūluddharaṇe kate pupphaphalapallavaṅkurasantati samucchinnā bhavati.
ne5:24.4_0: Evaṁ anusayesu pahīnesu pariyuṭṭhānasantati samucchinnā bhavati pidahitā paṭicchannā.
ne5:27.4_0: Tīṇi ca saccāni saṅkhatāni nirodhadhammāni dukkhaṁ samudayo maggo, nirodho asaṅkhato.
ne5:27.5_0: Tattha samudayo dvīsu bhūmīsu pahīyati dassanabhūmiyā ca bhāvanābhūmiyā ca.
ne5:27.6_0: Dassanena tīṇi saṁyojanāni pahīyanti sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso,
ne5:27.6_1: bhāvanāya satta saṁyojanāni pahīyanti kāmacchando byāpādo rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccaṁ avijjāvasesā.
ne5:27.7_0: Tedhātuke imāni dasa saṁyojanāni pañcorambhāgiyāni pañcuddhambhāgiyāni.
ne5:28.1_0: Tattha tīṇi saṁyojanāni sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ adhiṭṭhāya nirujjhanti.
ne5:28.2_0: Satta saṁyojanāni kāmacchando byāpādo rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccaṁ avijjāvasesā aññindriyaṁ adhiṭṭhāya nirujjhanti.
ne5:28.3_0: Yaṁ pana evaṁ jānāti “khīṇā me jātī”ti, idaṁ khaye ñāṇaṁ.
ne5:28.6_2: tattha yañca khaye ñāṇaṁ yañca anuppāde ñāṇaṁ, imāni dve ñāṇāni ekapaññā.
ne5:29.1_0: Api ca ārammaṇasaṅketena dve nāmāni labbhanti,
ne5:29.1_1: “khīṇā me jātī”ti pajānantassa khaye ñāṇanti nāmaṁ labhati,
ne5:29.1_2: “nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti pajānantassa anuppāde ñāṇanti nāmaṁ labhati.
ne5:30.2_0: Tattha ye phassapañcamakā dhammā, idaṁ nāmaṁ.
ne5:30.4_0: Tadubhayaṁ nāmarūpaṁ viññāṇasampayuttaṁ tassa nirodhaṁ bhagavantaṁ pucchanto āyasmā ajito pārāyane evamāha—
ne5:32.1_0: Tattha sati ca paññā ca cattāri indriyāni,
ne5:32.2_0: Yā imesu catūsu indriyesu saddahanā okappanā, idaṁ saddhindriyaṁ.
ne5:32.3_0: Tattha yā saddhādhipateyyā cittekaggatā, ayaṁ chandasamādhi.
ne5:32.4_0: Samāhite citte kilesānaṁ vikkhambhanatāya paṭisaṅkhānabalena vā bhāvanābalena vā, idaṁ pahānaṁ.
ne5:32.5_0: Tattha ye assāsapassāsā vitakkavicārā saññāvedayitā sarasaṅkappā, ime saṅkhārā.
ne5:32.6_1: kilesavikkhambhanatāya ca pahānaṁ ime ca saṅkhārā,
ne5:32.6_2: tadubhayaṁ chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
ne5:32.7_0: Tattha yā vīriyādhipateyyā cittekaggatā, ayaṁ vīriyasamādhi …pe…
ne5:32.8_0: tattha yā cittādhipateyyā cittekaggatā, ayaṁ cittasamādhi …pe…
ne5:32.9_0: tattha yā vīmaṁsādhipateyyā cittekaggatā, ayaṁ vīmaṁsāsamādhi.
ne5:32.10_0: Samāhite citte kilesānaṁ vikkhambhanatāya paṭisaṅkhānabalena vā bhāvanābalena vā, idaṁ pahānaṁ.
ne5:32.11_0: Tattha ye assāsapassāsā vitakkavicārā saññāvedayitā sarasaṅkappā, ime saṅkhārā.
ne5:32.12_1: kilesavikkhambhanatāya ca pahānaṁ ime ca saṅkhārā,
ne5:32.12_2: tadubhayaṁ vīmaṁsāsamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
ne5:35.1_0: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṁ cittaṁ bhāveti.
ne5:35.2_0: Pañcindriyāni kusalāni cittasahabhūni citte uppajjamāne uppajjanti,
ne5:35.3_2: viññāṇaṁ anāhāraṁ anabhinanditaṁ appaṭisandhikaṁ taṁ nirujjhati.
ne5:35.4_0: Nāmarūpamapi ahetu appaccayaṁ punabbhavaṁ na nibbattayati.
ne5:35.5_0: Evaṁ viññāṇassa nirodhā paññā ca sati ca nāmarūpañca nirujjhati.
ne5:38.1_0: Imāni tīṇi padāni pucchitāni, te tayo pañhā.
ne5:38.4_1: “ye ca sekkhā puthū idhā”ti sekhaṁ pucchati, “tesaṁ me nipako iriyaṁ,
ne5:38.4_2: puṭṭho pabrūhi mārisā”ti vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṁ pahānaṁ pucchati.
ne5:42.2_0: Yaṁ anicce dukkhe anattani ca aññāṇaṁ adassanaṁ,
ne5:43.2_0: Tattha sekhena dvīsu dhammesu cittaṁ rakkhitabbaṁ gedhā ca rajanīyesu dhammesu, dosā ca pariyuṭṭhānīyesu.
ne5:43.3_0: Tattha yā icchā mucchā patthanā piyāyanā kīḷanā,
ne5:44.2_0: Tathā hi sekho abhigijjhanto asamuppannañca kilesaṁ uppādeti,
ne5:44.3_1: so anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati.
ne5:44.4_0: So uppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati.
ne5:44.5_0: So anuppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati.
ne5:44.6_0: So uppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati.
ne5:45.6_0: Yāni sotāpannassa indriyāni, ime anuppannā kusalā dhammā.
ne5:45.8_0: Yāni aṭṭhamakassa indriyāni, ime uppannā kusalā dhammā.
ne5:46.4_0: Yena uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti nādhivāseti, idaṁ paññindriyaṁ.
ne5:46.5_0: Yā imesu catūsu indriyesu saddahanā okappanā, idaṁ saddhindriyaṁ.
ne5:47.11_0: Evaṁ sekho sabbehi kusalehi dhammehi appamatto vutto bhagavatā anāvilatāya manasā.
ne5:48.1_0: “Kusalo sabbadhammānan”ti loko nāma tividho kilesaloko bhavaloko indriyaloko.
ne5:48.2_0: Tattha kilesalokena bhavaloko samudāgacchati, so indriyāni nibbatteti,
ne5:48.3_0: Sā duvidhena upaparikkhitabbā dassanapariññāya ca bhāvanāpariññāya ca.
ne5:48.4_1: tadā nibbidāsahagatehi saññāmanasikārehi neyyaṁ pariññātaṁ bhavati.
ne5:49.4_0: Yaṁ dhammānaṁ salakkhaṇe ñāṇaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā ca atthapaṭisambhidā ca, ayaṁ abhiññā.
ne5:50.2_0: Evaṁ abhijānitvā yā parijānanā “idaṁ kusalaṁ, idaṁ akusalaṁ, idaṁ sāvajjaṁ, idaṁ anavajjaṁ, idaṁ kaṇhaṁ, idaṁ sukkaṁ, idaṁ sevitabbaṁ, idaṁ na sevitabbaṁ, ime dhammā evaṅgahitā, idaṁ phalaṁ nibbattenti,
ne5:50.2_1: tesaṁ evaṅgahitānaṁ ayaṁ attho”ti, ayaṁ pariññā.
ne5:51.1_0: Evaṁ parijānitvā tayo dhammā avasiṭṭhā bhavanti pahātabbā bhāvetabbā sacchikātabbā ca.
ne5:51.8_0: Yo evaṁ jānāti ayaṁ vuccati atthakusalo dhammakusalo kalyāṇatākusalo phalatākusalo,
ne5:51.8_1: āyakusalo apāyakusalo upāyakusalo mahatā kosallena samannāgatoti,
ne5:52.1_0: “Sato bhikkhu paribbaje”ti tena diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṁ abhikkante paṭikkante ālokite vilokite samiñjite pasārite saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe asite pīte khāyite sāyite uccārapassāvakamme gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhibhāve satena sampajānena vihātabbaṁ.
ne5:52.2_0: Imā dve cariyā anuññātā bhagavatā ekā visuddhānaṁ, ekā visujjhantānaṁ.
ne5:52.8_1: taṁ catubbidhaṁ dukkhassa pariññābhisamayena samudayassa pahānābhisamayena maggassa bhāvanābhisamayena nirodhassa sacchikiriyābhisamayena,
ne5:52.8_2: idaṁ catubbidhaṁ bojjhaṁ yo evaṁ jānāti,
ne5:52.8_3: ayaṁ vuccati sato abhikkamati sato paṭikkamati khayā rāgassa khayā dosassa khayā mohassa.
ne5:54.2_0: Suttassa ca anugīti atthato ca byañjanato ca samānetabbā.
ne5:54.6_0: Kiṁ idaṁ suttaṁ āhacca vacanaṁ anusandhivacanaṁ nītatthaṁ neyyatthaṁ saṅkilesabhāgiyaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ asekkhabhāgiyaṁ?
ne5:54.7_0: Kuhiṁ imassa suttassa sabbāni saccāni passitabbāni, ādimajjhapariyosāneti?
ne5:54.10_0: “yaṁ pucchitañca vissajjitañca, suttassa yā ca anugītī”ti.
